description:
Aloe is a young girl whose hair is made of aloe, which does not benefit her as she often requires water. Aloe does not often make direct contact with the other characters in the anime and her appearances are often a side story.
Aloe`s hair, bursts many of her vinyl wading pools due to its sharpness. Aloe is often seen throughout the series in a dizzy state, sometimes due to needing water and on other occasions due to misfortune.
name: Aloe-tan
